title: Synthesis of a resorcinol-based derivative as a corrosion inhibitor for low-carbon steel in 0.5 mol L−1 HCl medium: chemical, electrochemical, and theoretical aspects
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19428-19445
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03404J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Medhat M. Kamel, Mohamed A. Ghanem, Salah M. Rashwan, Mostafa. A. Mahmoud, Sameh A. El-Mekawy, Khaled M. H. Mohammed, Hoyida E. Ibrahim
This work illustrated the synthesis of a new simple resorcinol derivative, 4,6-dimethoxyisophthalohydrazide (DMIH) and confirmed its structure using 1H-NMR spectroscopy. Also, it assessed the ability of the DMIH to act as inhibitor for LCS in HCl.
